# Aletheia

> Self-hosted multi-agent AI system with a web UI, persistent memory, and Signal messaging.

Privacy-first distributed cognition. N agents + 1 human operator. Web chat UI (Svelte 5), dual-layer memory (Mem0 + sqlite-vec), automatic fact extraction, tool approval system, HTTP API.

## Key Directories
- [nous/_example/](nous/_example/): Template agent workspace (SOUL.md, USER.md, AGENTS.md, etc.)
- [shared/bin/](shared/bin/): Shared scripts (pplx, scholar, browse, ingest-doc, aletheia-graph, nous-health)
- [shared/config/](shared/config/): Environment and tool configuration
- [config/](config/): Example gateway config (aletheia.example.json)

- [infrastructure/runtime/src/](infrastructure/runtime/src/): Module architecture (taxis, mneme, hermeneus, organon, semeion, pylon, prostheke, nous, distillation, daemon, koina)
